name: 1 Night at Cheese Factory
description:
One night at Cheese Factory is a survival horror themed game inspired from the FNAF series.

You must survive the night and save the cheese as a mouse guard from an awful deadly cat with your rabots (rat - robots).

Objective:

You must stop the cat from destroying four of the fuse boxes that keep you safe until morning. 

There's one fuse box per room.

How to play:

Click on the right or left arrow to move your view left or right.

Left Click on a monitor or on the flash remote / clock to zoom in, Right Click to zoom out .

The monitor on the right shows the rabot's camera feed. You can turn the rabot right or left with the arrows on the top right of the screen. To activate the microphone on the rabot click the icon on the top left. The NEXT button on the bottom left will select the next robot (1 or 2).

The monitor on the left is used to move the rabots and to know which fuseboxes are damaged or broken. 

In the tracker tab you can move the rabots just by clicking one if the yellow dots.

The system tab shows the damaged fuse boxes.

The rabots tab shows which rabot you have selected and allows to recall a broken rabot for repair.

To repair a rabot you have to call it back and once it enters the room on your left, press the button on the wall for a couple of seconds.

If you catch the cat while he's damaging a fuse box, stop him with the flash.

To do so you have to use the little controller on the right above the timer. Select the rabot with one of the switches (left rabot1 and right rabot2) and press the red button.
